# Calendar.RecurrenceRule.End

**Structure**

When a recurring event stops recurring

## Declaration

```swift
struct End
```

## Instance Properties

- **date**: The latest date when the event may occur This value is set when the struct was initialized with `.afterDate()`
- **occurrences**: At most many times the event may occur This value is set when the struct was initialized with `.afterOccurrences()`

## Type Properties

- **never**: The event repeats indefinitely

## Type Methods

- **afterDate(_:)**: The event stops repeating after a given date
- **afterOccurrences(_:)**: The event stops repeating after a given number of times

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
